Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Active against a broad spectrum of Gram+ bacteria (e.g., L. s delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus; L. amylophilus; L. lactis; M. luteus; S. smutans), including clinical strains S. aureus, C. difficile, and L. monocytogenes.

Literature.Title: Formicin - a novel broad-spectrum two-component lantibiotic produced by Bacillus paralicheniformis APC 1576.
Literature.Author: Collins FW, O'Connor PM, O'Sullivan O, Rea MC, Hill C, Ross RP
